body:
Convenience function to open spack.yaml of the active environment in the editor. 

I guess many (most?) things can be done without manually editing spack.yaml, but for example adding `concretize: together` or messing with a build matrix is easily done from the editor. 

Not sure how to test this. Happy to add a test if someone has a suggestion?
title: add "spack env edit" command to open spack.yaml in editor
